item.title: Integration with TestRail
item.author: vasili.gulevich@xored.com (Vasili Gulevich)
item.description: Configuration To configure connection to TestRail, you need to know the following parameters: host — TestRail Host. Should be valid URL and end with slash “/”. username — Username. password — Password or API Key. projectId — Project ID. Should start with “P” and end with positive number. testRunId (optional) — Test Run ID. Should start with “R” and end with positive number. useUnicode (optional) — Is Unicode used to encode requests to TestRail.
